category.Name: category
category.Description: Type of observation. Always includes SNOMED codes “118228005” and “384821006”, and custom code “functional-mental status.”

code.Name: code
code.Description: The type of observation. Values mapped. If no mapping exists, only the text value is returned.

comment.Name: comment
comment.Description: Comments about the observation. A comment if flowsheet data or the associated note if inpatient goals. If using cascading flowsheets, the note element contains information about the additional flowsheet, if applicable, instead of the note. For example, a nurse documents flowsheet “daily activities” as abnormal, which opens flowsheet “mobility.” The nurse documents the value “highly mobile” in the flowsheet. The note element for “daily activities” is returned as “daily activities;highly mobile” if flowsheet “mobility” isn’t included in the Epic organization's configuration.

effectivePeriod.Name: effectivePeriod
effectivePeriod.Description: Clinically relevant time-period for the observation

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description:
Available in Netherlands environments only. This element shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to one of the following canonical urls:
•	http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-LivingSituation
•	http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-DrugUse
•	http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-AlcoholUse
•	http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-TobaccoUse
•	http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-FunctionalOrMentalStatus

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Who the observation is about. Reference to the patient resource.

valueCodeableConcept.Name: valueCodeableConcept
valueCodeableConcept.Description: Result of the observation. Values mapped. If not mapping exists, only the text value is returned.
